name: Derrick Bickford
text: We came to this restaurant for dinner. we heard about this spot from a lot of people.  Well, we were not disappointed. The staff were extremely nice and we had a great feeling. The meal was delicious. We had a great time and we will visit this place again. Recommended.

name: E ORTIZ
text: Salad is a pretty good bargain. We usually go there for the greek or antipasto. We easily get three generous side servings out of the regular size. Very friendly staff.

name: Jennifer Alexander
text: They were very nice and the pizza was wondedful i would've loved to give them a 4 stars but  they did not use gloves and they made the pizza right in front of usüòï very unsanitary everything they touched was without gloves
